title: Touch ID Button 16" 2019 MacBook Pro
message:
Need some help please.

Had to replace the topcase and unfortunately the cable broke off. I tryed to solder that under the microscope but the seems to be a pain in the a...

has anyone of you an idea what could i do here ?

thanks all

title: Touch ID Button 16" 2019 MacBook Pro
message: so i think i am screwed isnt it?

title: Touch ID Button 16" 2019 MacBook Pro
message: If you cannot resolder the flex, only Apple can replace Touch ID, as it needs to be paired with the MLB.

title: Touch ID Button 16" 2019 MacBook Pro
message:
ok. 
So, if I replace the Mainboard with another one and the touch Id button with the touch id button from the donar mainboard that will work.
the question is, if i clone the ssd from the old mainboard to the new and the client has saved touch id informations from fingers, does her can use all again or there will be problems?

title: Touch ID Button 16" 2019 MacBook Pro
message: There should be an option to register fingerprint again, if needed.
